page.title: 12Summer in Kington Langley 1.
page.content:
In Summertime we usually have the School Fete. This year we had a{ {Victorian Country Fair.}We danced around the Maypole, sang Victorian songs like "Oh I do like to be beside the Seaside", had sideshows and dressed up as Victorians. Nearly all the children in the school were in costume.There was also a display of Victorian things like books, pictures, clothes, samplers and even an old school desk.
It was twenty five years ago that the villagers first opened the Playing Fields, so there was an{Anniversary {Celebration}with football matches, clay pigeon shooting, obstacle course and a barbecue. It was opened by a local celebrity and went on all day, until the football tournament ended.
